remarks: Write a double restricted quantification as one universal quantifier. In this version of ~ rexxp , ` B ( y ) ` is not assumed to be constant. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ralxp.1 $e |- ( x = <. y , z >. -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rexiunxp $p |- ( E. x e. U_ y e. A ( { y } X. B ) ph <-> E. y e. A E. z e. B ps ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x z $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x $.
